en.title: Professional Network Marketing Course (Bahasa Language) 25th - 26th April 2009
en.content: FE recently organized a Professional Network Marketing Course in Bahasa language with Open University Malaysia Certificate at Empress Hotel Sepang on 25th - 26th April 2009. The course was well attended by around 110 enthusiastic FE Leaders and Members. FE would like to give special thanks to FE's Dynamite Presidential Director Dr Mohd Fadil and FE's Consultant Trainer Dr BN Edwards for successfully conducting the 2 days 1 night course. Special thanks also to PDs Azizuddin, Norhayati and Wan Mohd Firdaus for assisting. All the participants were fully charged and motivated upon completion of the course!
